String.string:
Take the reins! Run for a Valkyon Federation Vanarch's office and win honor and power. Each Vanarch manages one province, setting policies and profiting from local taxes.
Register at any major city's Election Registrar. Eligibility: At least level {UserLevel}. Guild Master of a level {GuildLevel} guild with at least {Count} guild members. Registration Fee: {Amount} Catharnach Awards. {Gold@money}.
Good Luck!

Congratulations! You are {guardName} province's {lordNumber}{@ordinal:{lordNumber}} Vanarch! Privileges: You earn gold from any tax surplus. Your guild members gain Honor Steeds. Powers: You can adjust tax rates, change PvP rules, assign specialty NPCs, and make provincial announcements to users. Process: Manage policies and tax rates through Aides in most provincial towns.
The Valkyon Federation thanks you for your service. We have attached the rest of your provincial tax profits.
Set store and service tax rates
Close specialty stores that sell items not available in normal stores.
Open specialty stores that sell items not available in normal stores.
Clerics of Restoration will restore players' Stamina.
Noble Clerics of Restoration restore players' Stamina and also add a speed buff.
Tax rate on sales at local General Stores.
Tax rate on sales at local Crystal Stores.
Tax rate on service from local Glyphmasters.
Tax rate on sales at local Crafting Stores.
Tax levied on travel by Pegasus in the province.
Tax on all skill training in the province.
Tax levied on teleport travel in the province.
The {PolicyName} policy of {GuardName} province has reset to {PolicyItemName}.
Tax rate on sales at local Specialty Stores.

During candidate registration, guild masters may apply to run for vanarch
via Election Registrars and select their preferred provinces.

Candidates compete for a zone on their selected continent through votes or
GvG points. All contests are per continent. Eligible players can vote by
clicking the vote icon near the Compass. Candidates with the greatest
number of votes or GvG points win.

If you win a vanarchy, you are assigned a province according to ranking.
You will be obligated to manage the province honorably. Via NPC Aides,
vanarchs make policies, set tax rates, and keep order.

Current Stage: Registration
End time: {CurrentStateEndTime}

Next Stage: Competition
Start time: {NextStateStartTime}

Current Stage: Competition
End time: {CurrentStateEndTime}

Next Stage: Reign
Start time: {NextStateStartTime}

Current Stage: Reign
End time: {CurrentStateEndTime}

Start time: {NextStateStartTime}
